item.title: FlexTelONE Offers Four Calling Services in One
item.description: This international calling service combines four services into one easy-to-manage online account, helping you save money on calls. FlexTelONE bundles a calling card, conference calling, dial-around, and a follow-me locator service. Let’s explore the features and advantages of each service. The calling card allows calls from both the US and internationally, a key feature for international callers. Calls within the US cost just 5.9 cents per minute, while calls from Canada are 8.

item.title: Unlimited International Landline Calls
item.description: We all know international calls can be pricey, making internet calls very appealing. As long as it’s computer-to-computer, you only pay for your internet service. But what if you want to use your regular phone line or cell phone? Is unlimited calling for a low fixed price even possible? Now it is. IBNtel Unlimited Long Distance is a new service that works with your existing phones â€“ no computer needed. It offers unlimited international long distance calling.
